"Rossa": "Attention, all ARKS. An extremely powerful DOLL has been confirmed in the area."
"Based on our past records, it is very likely to be the Battlefield Overseer-type DOLL known as Crocodallus Vera."
"Crocodallus Vera is heavily-armed and may be difficult to engage at long range. Aim your attacks at its lightly-armored mouth!"
